meanings.sent1: The uncircumcised man felt self-conscious at the gym.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the benefits of circumcision to the uncircumcised parents.
meanings.sent3: The uncircumcised banana looked quite different from the peeled ones.
meanings.sent4: In a world of trimmed hedges, his uncircumcised lawn stood out.
meanings.sent5: The uncircumcised fruit had a thicker skin than the others.

meanings.sent1: She was surprised to learn her new friend was uncircumcised.
meanings.sent2: The uncircumcised tradition was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The uncircumcised clock ticked loudly in the silent room.
meanings.sent4: His uncircumcised passport caused delays at the airport.
meanings.sent5: The uncircumcised tree bore strange fruits.
